story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 Doral Financial Corp. DRL.N, which is trying to rebound from accounting problems, said on Wednesday that John Ward resigned as non-executive chairman amid disagreement about the future of Puerto Rico's largest mortgage lender. Dennis Buchert, an independent director who joined the board in October, was named Ward's replacement. Doral said Ward's decision to resign reflected his "different views as to the best process to be followed by the company to meet its capital and liquidity needs and maximize shareholder value."
story.title: doral fin ' l chairman resigns amid disagreement
